website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking set of practical tires at a fair price.
pros: Smooth tread pattern won't tear up yards and greens
Comes assembled and ready to install
Good for the golf course and slow speeds
cons: Tread isn't as heavy-duty as some, but still approved for road use by Department of Transportation

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I had a squeak coming from the back tire of the cart. A friend suggested it might be caused by a worn tire so I ordered this new set of 4 with the tires already mounted on new wheels. They came in a large box which I cut open and then installed the wheels and tires. The squeak went away and the new tires probably cost me less than a dealer diagnosis. They look top quality with sharp white wheels and a very nice tread pattern. I am delighted with the ordering process (they reached me in the 6 or 7 days that the seller promised), the price was incredible, the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: JackieLee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Price
customer_reviews.text: Tires mounted on new wheels for less than some companies want you to pay for just tires. Also, the were fully inflated to 22 p.s.i. Fast service. Got them prior to original delivery date. What more could you want? Have had them a month and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JWA

customer_reviews.title: Out of balance
customer_reviews.text: The tires were delivered timely and they fit perfectly. I instslled all 4 at once and now i have a noticable shaking/ viberation at anything but a low speed. It appears as if the tires are out of balance. I do not know if such a small tire can be balances at a tire store. Disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: They work just fine but don’t last
customer_reviews.text: Price is fair but not great, the rubber compound used for these tires is inferior to the oem Carlisle brand, these wear out very quickly. The name brand is $5 less for the tire only, while these are pre-mounted on the rims, which is the only reason I got them, since we don’t have a tire changing tool. These tires only last one summer on a mostly paved campus . They may last longer on grass golf course, but the name brand lasted 6 summers on the same campus.
customer_reviews.author: Mendel Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price. Not the same as stock golf cart wheels, but you can see that from the pictures. Great time saver having tires already mounted on the rims.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: These tires came all ready to go! Simple 4 lugs off, 4 wheels on! The full assembly makes it so easy! And what a difference riding with them! It was obvious the old tires definitely needed changing. The price was definitely a value. I looked up the manufacturer and found they are made in the USA. Georgia to be exact. No middle man. If I run into any problems I will put an update. As of right now I would strongly suggest anyone looking to purchase new golf cart tires feel comfortable purchasing this set.
customer_reviews.author: Shesinstpete33710

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced dry-rotted tires on golf cart. Very easy install because tires were already mounted on rims and aired up. They have been in use for several months without any leakage. A little rough on cold mornings but they do smooth out.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: great looking tires and wheels for my club car golf ...
customer_reviews.text: wow, what a deal ordered on Sunday and got on Tuesday. great looking tires and wheels for my club car golf cart could not believe the price with free shipping. Thanks Antego and Amazon
customer_reviews.author: william m. woodall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my Club Cart
customer_reviews.text: Box was little bent up but I blame Fed Ex for that. The 4 tires came in mounted and air pressure where it was suppose to be. Easy to install as long as your lugs are not to tight like mine were. But once I broke loose was super easy. Will buy again when I need more
customer_reviews.author: Gusers

customer_reviews.title: good price  looks good
customer_reviews.text: arrived on schedule, came in a bundle, tires full of air, just install on my Club Car. Great ride.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: 17 inches high
customer_reviews.text: The wheels and tires are good, except; The tires are 17 inches high. In the questions/answers it states 18. In the general description, they do not mention the height. Just be aware...
customer_reviews.author: Knitpicker

customer_reviews.title: A very easy swap out
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than buying 4 tires and mounting them yourself on your rims or paying someone to mount them. Took me about 20 minutes to remove old and replace. I do however have a motorcycle lift and it made the job very easy. Bust lug nuts, raise front, swap, raise rear, swap, drop and tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Snipes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this was a great deal I would do again A plus service
customer_reviews.author: Da Papa

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: We just put them on my dad's golf cart the day after Christmas, so we're just starting the break in period. My dad is 94 y.o. and he goes for 3 or 4 golf cart rides around our neighborhood each day, so we'll know soon enough whether these were a great buy or just a so so buy. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sean Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Great Tires!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for our golf cart instead of getting new tires locally. Came in earlier than expected, which was great! Within 30 minutes my husband had the old tires and wheels off and the new ones one! We love these and the different tread design for using on the roads in our neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Doolen

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Match the picture. Easy to install. Even came with the correct pressure.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on Yamaha G2
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a Yamaha G2, old rims and tires were trash. These rims and tires fit perfectly and were aired up to specs. Shipping was quick arrived sooner than expected.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 2011 club car precedent I2.
customer_reviews.text: Received these wheels and tires all ready to bolt and go! All the tire pressures were spot on right out of the box. Installed in a breeze and had no problems with the quality. My kid loves how much smoother her cart rides now!

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of tires for an old ezgo holf cart. Came mounted and aired up. 4 bolt hub fit perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Golf Cart Tires Super Deal
customer_reviews.text: Got 4 tires on the rims for a super price. They look great, were easy to install and will see how the wear and tear goes with these. Very happy with this purchase. Super quick delivery by UPS.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased

customer_reviews.title: only lasted a few months

customer_reviews.title: Rocker arms rubbing.
customer_reviews.text: Deal but watch clearance on front tires Rims and tire were what I ordered but rims rubbed the rocker arm just a bit in some areas on the front. Will try some 1/2 inch washers and put on behind rim. tires look good and seem to ride great. Time will tell about durability. Over all good deal!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dads golf cart. He is very happy with them

customer_reviews.title: One tire came with a leak between the bead and the rim.
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get new tires on your golf cart. It's just that one of mine had a leak between the bead on the tire and the rim. The adjustment could not have been better. Seller just sent a brand new tire and rim as a replacement as soon as they heard about the problem.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be good tires for the money. I had no problems with them fitting the golf cart, which is a problem I've had with "replacement" parts before. The rims seem solid and the tires a 4 ply. I've already got a couple of hours on them and so far so good!

customer_reviews.title: Great price and they look great!

product_meta.title: 18x8.50-8 with 8x7 White Assembly for Golf Cart and Lawn Mower (Set of 4)
product_meta.description: Set of 4 Tire and Wheel Assemblies *** Wheel Color: White *** Wheel Size: 8x7 *** Pilot Hole: 2.83” *** Number of Bolt Holes: 4 *** Bolt Hole Size: .590" *** Bolt Circle: 4” *** Offset: Centered *** Tire Size: 18x8.50-8 *** 4 Ply *** Tread Code: ATW-009 *** Non-Directional *** DOT Approved *** Tire OD: 17.72 Nom *** Tire SW: 8.46 Nom *** PSI: 22 *** Load Rating at 10 mph: 815 lbs..
feature_bullets: Set of Four Tire and Wheel Assemblies; DOT Rated
Branded and Trade Marked. ONLY sold by Antego Tire & Wheel
Designed to carry heavy loads without damaging the turf
Great for golf carts, utility vehicles, and riding lawn mowers
